thread.title: Juan G.
thread.title_full: Hardware Source reviewed by Juan G.

author: Juan G.
title: Juan G.
text: We looked and looked every where for a special hinge. I decided to go online and found Hardware Source. Any type of hinge you need, they have. The hinge worked perfect and does what I needed it to do. Now I do not have to worry about the door slamming down on me when I want to store items under my bench storage. Thank you Hardware Source.
